FrageText.de: Welche Organisation erreichen Sie mit der Euro-Notrufnummer 112?
FrageText.en: Which of the following organisations will you reach by the European emergency number 112?
FrageText.hr: Koju ustanovu nazivate evropskim telefonskim interventnim brojem u nuždi 112?
FrageText.sl: Katera organizacija je dosegljiva na Evro-klicno številko 112?
FrageText.tr: 112 Euro-Acil yardım telefon numarası hangi kuruma aittir?

en.Text: In Austria - the Ministry of Finance
